location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 10: James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of Government commands dated 9 June, which were accompanied by a copy of instructions issued by Major General Smith to the senior officers of the Marine in the Persian Gulf. The instructions relate to a system of cruiz [cruise] and watch which has been established for the Marine's cruisers.
